== Main Inclusion Report for tipa ==

=== Requirements ===

# ''Availability:'' http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/t/tipa, arch:all.
# ''Rationale:''
** Build dependency of jadetex
 0. ''Security:''
** No <nowiki>[[http://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvekey.cgi?keyword=tipa|CVE entries]]</nowiki>.
** No <nowiki>[[http://secunia.com/search/?search=tipa|Secunia history]]</nowiki>.
** No binaries running as root or suid/sgid.
** Does not open any port.
** Just a LaTeX module, very few attack vectors.
 0. ''Quality assurance:''
** Package works out of the box without configuration.
** Package does not ask any debconf questions higher than priority 'normal'.
** No showstopper <nowiki>[[http://bugs.debian.org/src:tipa|Debian bugs]]</nowiki>.
** Good <nowiki>[[http://packages.qa.debian.org/t/tipa.html|maintenance in Debian]]</nowiki>.
** Does not deal with exotic hardware which we cannot support.
 0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** Meets the <nowiki>[[http://www.pathname.com/fhs/|FHS]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://www.de.debian.org/doc/debian-policy/|Debian Policy]]</nowiki>
** Standard debhelper packaging, standard patch system.
 0. ''Dependencies:''
** All in main.
